schoolLocation: Plot 16, Aftabuddin Ahmed Road, Block B, Bashnudhara RA, Dhaka 1229, Bangladesh.
description: Completed Bachelor of Science in CSE with a minor in Engineering Mathematics at IUB in 2021 with a CGPA of 3.64. Participated in extracurricular activities such as hackathons, programming challenges, and olympiads, and represented my university in the ICPC Asia Dhaka Regional competition in 2019. These experiences have helped me develop a strong foundation in computer science and valuable skills.
activitiesandsocieties: IEEE Computer Society IUB Student Branch Chapter
